body: SmartCulm is a mobile && web app developed for the CULM
(Centro Universitario de Lenguas Modernas de Zaragoza).
The app provides to the students access to all the information needed about the CULM for a more pleasent
stay in the center during the course:
• Schedules of all subjects imparted in the centre by teacher, level, building...
• Information about all the teachers (office, tutorials, contact email, etc.)
• Information about the campus (contact phone, address, map, etc.)
The Android APK is not available since it has been removed from the official repository
The demo, preferably, should be tested in a mobile device browser.
MediumCandy URLShortener is an experimental URL shortener with the following functionalities:
• Short an url if reachable and valid
• Short url's included in a CSV file
• Get info and stats over a shortened url
• Backend: RESTful web service with JAX-RS && Spring Framework
DownTorrent is a webapp that simplifies and unifies the process of download a torrent. In the same app you can:
• Search for a torrent in The Pirate Bay
• Download and manage (delete, pause, resume) the torrent as well as watch the download progress
• Scan the downloaded torrents with an antivirus if you want to make sure it is free of viruses
• Upload the torrents to a S3 bucket, and download them anytime you want
This project is motivated by the need of some relatives to download films, books, etc. from the internet
without the difficulty of search for it in the browser (as well to avoid all the advertising these kind of pages produce),
add it to a torrent client, etc. The fact of have the full process in the same app, make it easier for them.
NOTE: In the demo you can login with the user "demo"
Hattrick is a ReactJS + Redux + React-Router webapp that can be used as base for a community game where users can register, login, join to differents communities, post comments, etc.
The base of the game is that users would answers, everyday, 3 questions related to the community category, winning points and playing this way against the rest of the community users.
All of this can be made thanks a REST API developed with Loopback. The API is prepared to work only with logged users, using authentication tokens. An email system is also implemented,
allowing users to receive emails when they register or change their password.

• Loopback: Node.js API Framework
  • MySQL database
  • PM2 Node.js process manager

• Login screen
  • Main screen with graph and grid of user statistics
The user will be able to login in the portal and see some user statistics represented in a graph and a grid.
• ClaudiaJS: to build the AWS API Gateway
• AWS: to deploy the API Gateway and the Lambda function
Routes EINA is an SmartCampus that allows students and any other person who access the campus to
know where they are in every moment, how to move through and between the buildings,
where to find some services, etc...
The main funcionalities of the app are:
• Search of almost any room in the Campus buildings
• Search of routes between rooms of different buildings and floors
• Download of the Campus restaurants weekly menu
• Save positions in the map as favorites
• Save and remember where you parked your car with a double touch!
• DB: PostgreSQL (with the use of PostGIS && PgRouting)
